Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "It's true. The scorpion is wrapping around an emerald, protecting it. I see, that seems very useful."
Steam (ST): "It's true. The scorpion wraps around the emerald and protects it. Yes, that certainly does sound like it'd work well."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "It's true. The scorpion wraps around the emerald and protects it. I see, that seems very useful."
PC Japanese (JP): 「本当だ。サソリがエメラルドを抱いて守ってるね。なるほど、これはご利益がありそうだよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「本当だ。サソリがエメラルドを抱いて守ってるね。なるほど、これはご利益がありそうだよ」
Russian (RU): "Это правда. Скорпион обвивается вокруг изумруда, защищая его. Понятно, действительно очень полезное сочетание."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É verdade. O escorpião está envolto em uma esmeralda, protegendo ele. Entendi, parece ser muito útil."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「真的呢。蠍子正環繞保護著祖母綠念珠呢。原來如此，那看來是會很靈驗啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「真的呢。蝎子正环绕保护着祖母绿念珠呢。原来如此，那看来是会很灵验啊。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Itu benar. Kalajengking melingkari zamrud dan menjaganya. Ya, itu terdengar seperti kombinasi yang ampuh."
Italian (IT): "Hai proprio ragione. Lo scorpione avvolge lo smeraldo e lo protegge. Capisco, credo che ci porterà fortuna."
Turkish (TR): "Bu doğru. Akrep bir zümrüdün etrafını sararak onu koruyor. Anlıyorum, çok kullanışlı görünüyor."

Umineko Project (UP): I really wanted to make fun of this worthless‐looking charm, but as I watched Maria explaining the charm with all of her heart, and realized that she had prepared them out of consideration for us, it felt as though, even if it were just a prize from a game center, it would still be beneficial.
Steam (ST): I really wanted to make fun of those worthless looking charms, but as I watched Maria explaining with all of her heart and realized that she'd found them for our sakes, I started to feel like it might actually work, even if it was just a prize from some game center.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I really wanted to make fun of this worthless looking charm, but as I watched Maria explaining the charm with all of her heart, and realized that she had prepared them out of consideration for us, it felt as though, even if it were just a prize from a game center, it would still be beneficial.
PC Japanese (JP): あまりにも安っぽそうなお守りに、色々と減らず口でツッコミをしたい気持ちもあったが、俺たちのためを思って用意してくれたお守りの効能を一生懸命語る真里亞を見ていると、たとえゲームセンターの景品のお守りであったとしても、ご利益があるように感じられた。
Russian (RU): Меня так и подмывало посмеяться над этими дешёвыми талисманами, но смотря на то, как Мария вкладывает в рассказ всю свою душу, я понял, что она действительно заботится о нас. И даже если талисманы и походили на призы из игрового автомата, они всё же могли принести пользу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu realmente queria rir desse amuleto sem valor, mas vendo a Maria explicando sobre ele com todo o seu coração, e percebendo que ela havia preparado eles por consideração a nós, era como se, mesmo sendo um prêmio de fliperama, pudesse ter algum benefício.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然我很想把這過分寒酸的護身符各方面吐槽個遍，但是看著真里亞為了我們辛辛苦苦地把它找出來，並拚命述說效果的樣子，我不由得感覺這護身符即便就是游戲廳的獎品，它也會靈驗。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然我很想把这过分寒酸的护身符各方面吐槽个遍，但是看着真里亚为了我们辛辛苦苦地把它找出来，并拼命述说效果的样子，我不由得感觉这护身符即便就是游戏厅的奖品，它也会灵验。
Indonesian (IDN): Aku benar-benar ingin menertawakan jimat yang terlihat tidak berharga itu, tapi saat kulihat Maria menjelaskannya dengan sepenuh hati dan menyadari bahwa dia menemukannya demi kami, aku mulai merasa benda itu mungkin benar-benar manjur, meski cuma hadiah dari game center.
Italian (IT): Avevo voglia di fare diverse battutine su quegli amuleti così scadenti, ma quando vidi Maria metterci tutta se stessa nel raccontare gli effetti degli amuleti che aveva preparato pensando a noi, mi sembrava che l'amuleto potesse davvero portarci fortuna, anche se era un premio di qualche sala giochi.
Turkish (TR): Bu değersiz görünümlü tılsımla gerçekten dalga geçmek istiyordum, ancak Maria'nın tılsımı tüm kalbiyle açıklamasını izlerken ve bunları bizi düşünerek hazırladığını fark ettiğimde, sadece bir oyun salonundan bir ödül olsa bile yine de faydalı olacağını hissettim.

Umineko Project (UP): Material quality isn't what's important about charms. It's the strength of the feelings behind them.{n}I'd like to think I have enough respect for myself not to make fun of those.
Steam (ST): The material quality of the charm didn't matter. What mattered was the strength of her feelings. Even I don't think of myself as the sort of loser who'd laugh at something like that.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The material quality of the charm wasn't important. The strength of her feelings was. Even I wouldn't plan on ruining everything by making fun of it.
PC Japanese (JP): お守りは材質が問題じゃないよな。気持ちの強さの問題さ。そいつを小馬鹿にするほど、俺も落ちぶれちゃいないつもりだぜ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): お守りは材質が問題じゃないよな。気持ちの強さの問題さ。{n}そいつを小馬鹿にするほど、俺も落ちぶれちゃいないつもりだぜ。
Russian (RU): В талисмане совершенно не важно, из чего он сделан. А вот чувства, вложенные в талисман, имели силу.{n}Хотелось бы думать, что во мне достаточно самоуважения, чтобы всё не испортить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A qualidade do material de um amuleto não é o mais importante. E sim a força por trás dos sentimentos que o representam.{n}Eu gostaria de pensar que tenho respeito suficiente a mim mesmo para não ficar debochando deles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 護身符的材料不是問題。問題是心意是否深厚。{n}我還沒有墮落到，去嘲笑那玩意的地步。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 护身符的材料不是问题。问题是心意是否深厚。{n}我还没有堕落到，去嘲笑那玩意的地步。
Indonesian (IDN): Bahan pembuat jimat itu tak penting. Yang penting adalah ketulusan perasaannya. Bahkan aku pun bukan tipe orang yang sebegitu buruknya sampai menertawakan hal seperti itu.
Italian (IT): Non contava la qualità dei materiali dell'amuleto. Ma la forza dei suoi sentimenti. Nemmeno io vorrei prendermi gioco di una cosa simile.
Turkish (TR): Tılsımlarda önemli olan maddi kalite değildir. Arkalarında yatan duyguların gücüdür.{n}Bunlarla dalga geçmeyecek kadar kendime saygı duyduğumu düşünmek isterim.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "Okay, thank you. I apologized to {f:5:Beatrice}‐sama, but, even in the worst case where I'm cursed, I'll be safe now thanks to your charm. Right, Jessica?"
Steam (ST): "Okay, thank you. I apologized to {f:5:Beatrice}-sama, but even if I do end up getting cursed, I'll be safe now thanks to Maria's charm. Right, Jessica?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Okay, thank you. I apologized to Beatrice-sama, but, even in the worst case where I'm cursed, I'll be safe now thanks to Maria's charm. Right, Jessica?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「そっか、ありがとな。ベアトリーチェさまには謝ったけどよ、万が一、崇りがある時でも、真里亞のこのお守りのお陰で安心だぜ。なぁ、朱志香ぁ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そっか、ありがとな。ベアトリーチェさまには謝ったけどよ、万が一、祟りがある時でも、真里亞のこのお守りのお陰で安心だぜ。なぁ、朱志香ぁ」
Russian (RU): "Хорошо, спасибо. Я извинился перед {f:5:Беатриче}‐сама, но если при самом худшем раскладе я окажусь проклят, я буду в безопасности, благодаря твоему талисману. Верно, Джессика?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Certo, muito obrigado. Eu me desculpei com a {f:5:Beatrice}‐sama, mas, se mesmo assim eu for amaldiçoado, eu vou ficar seguro graças ao seu amuleto. Não é mesmo, Jessica?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是這樣啊，謝謝啦。雖然跟貝阿朵莉切夫人道過歉了，但萬一還是遇上作祟，有真里亞的護身符保護，我也可以放心了。是吧，朱志香？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是这样啊，谢谢啦。虽然跟贝阿朵莉切夫人道过歉了，但万一还是遇上作祟，有真里亚的护身符保护，我也可以放心了。是吧，朱志香？」
Indonesian (IDN): "Oke, terima kasih. Aku sudah minta maaf pada {f:5:Beatrice}-sama, tapi meskipun aku akhirnya kena kutuk, aku akan selamat berkat jimat Maria. Benar begitu, Jessica?"
Italian (IT): "Capito, grazie. Io con {f:5:Beatrice}-sama mi sono scusato, ma se dovessi venire maledetto, grazie all'amuleto di Maria posso stare tranquillo. Giusto, Jessica?"
Turkish (TR): "Tamam, teşekkür ederim. {f:5:Beatrice}-sama'dan özür diledim ama lanetlendiğim en kötü durumda bile tılsımın sayesinde artık güvende olacağım. Değil mi Jessica?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah, that's right! Thank you, Maria."
Steam (ST): "Yeah, that's right! Thanks, Maria."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Ah, that's right! Thank you, Maria."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あぁ、そうだぜ！　ありがとうな、真里亞。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あぁ、そうだぜ！　ありがとうな、真里亞」
Russian (RU): "Именно так! Спасибо, Мария."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「啊，没错嘞！谢啦，真里亚。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Ya, betul! Terima kasih, Maria."
Italian (IT): "Ah, è vero! Grazie, Maria."
Turkish (TR): "Evet, doğru! Teşekkürler, Maria."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "Uu! Wear it on your arm when you want a peaceful heart. If you put it in your wallet, your money won't go down! If you hang it from a doorknob, bad things can't get in! A really useful charm!"
Steam (ST): "Uu-! Wear it on your arm when you want your heart to be at peace. Put it in your wallet and your money won't decrease! If you hang it from a doorknob, bad things can't get in! It's a really convenient charm!"

PC Japanese (JP): 「うー！　心に平穏が欲しい時は腕に付ける。お財布に入れるとお金が減らなくなる！　ドアノブに掛けておくと悪いモノが入ってこられなくなる！　便利なお守り！」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uu! Coloque ele em seu braço quando quiser um coração em paz. Se colocar na sua carteira, o seu dinheiro nunca vai acabar! Se colocar na fechadura, as coisas ruins não vão conseguir entrar! É realmente um amuleto muito útil!"

Indonesian (IDN): "Uu-! Pakai di tangan saat ingin ketenangan hati. Masukkan ke dompet supaya uang tidak cepat habis! Gantung di gagang pintu supaya hal buruk tidak bisa masuk! Ini jimat yang sangat praktis!"
Italian (IT): "Uuh! Quando vuoi la pace mentale, mettilo sul braccio. Se lo metterai nel portafoglio, i tuoi soldi non diminueranno! Se lo appenderai ad una maniglia, i mostri cattivi non potranno entrare! È un amuleto che vi sarà utile!"
Turkish (TR): "Uu! Huzur dolu bir kalp istediğinde bunu koluna tak. Cüzdanına koyarsan, paran yere düşmez! Kapı koluna asarsan, kötü şeyler içeri giremez! Gerçekten kullanışlı bir tılsım!"

Speaker: Shannon
Umineko Project (UP): "What an incredible effect. If it is a charm that Maria‐sama can recommend with confidence, I am sure it will be reliable."
Steam (ST): "What an incredible effect. If Maria-sama gives it her confident seal of approval, then it surely must be reliable."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "What an incredible effect. If Maria-sama is confident in this charm and recommends it, I am sure it will be reliable."
PC Japanese (JP): 「それはすごい効能ですね。真里亞さまが自信を持って勧めるお守りなら、きっと頼もしいものと思います。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「それはすごい効能ですね。真里亞さまが自信を持って勧めるお守りなら、きっと頼もしいものと思います」

Original Witch Hunt (OG): As Shannon-chan clapped her hands together, Maria stuck out her chest.

Umineko Project (UP): If it would keep her in this good of a mood, it would probably be worth it to let Maria lead the discussion for a while longer.
Steam (ST): It's probably best if we let her lead the conversation a bit longer, if it'll keep her in such a good mood.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If it would keep her in this good of a mood, it would probably be worth it to let Maria lead the discussion for a while longer.
PC Japanese (JP): こんなにも上機嫌になってくれるなら、もうしばらく話の主役を真里亞に譲ってもいいだろう。
Russian (RU): Если так можно поддержать у Марии хорошее настроение, то, пожалуй, стоит позволить ей повести разговор в этом направлении.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se isso fosse deixar ela de bom‐humor, provavelmente seria melhor deixar a Maria conduzir a discussão por um tempo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 既然真里亞心情變得這麼好，那就讓她再當一會主角吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 既然真里亚心情变得这么好，那就让她再当一会主角吧。
Indonesian (IDN): Sepertinya akan lebih baik kalau kami biarkan dia memimpin percakapan sedikit lebih lama, demi menjaga suasana hati baiknya itu.
Italian (IT): Se questo poteva mettere di buonumore Maria, sarebbe stato meglio lasciarla guidare la conversazione ancora per un po'.
Turkish (TR): Eğer onu bu kadar iyi bir ruh halinde tutacaksa, tartışmayı bir süre daha Maria'nın yönetmesine izin vermek muhtemelen buna değerdi.

Umineko Project (UP): When you think about it, she hadn't shared in our excitement when we talked about the gold's hidden location, so I think she had gotten a little bored.
Steam (ST): Come to think of it, she looked a bit bored when we were getting excited about the hidden gold, probably because she couldn't keep up.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When you think about it, she hadn't shared in our excitement when we talked about the gold's hidden location, so I think she had gotten a little bored.
PC Japanese (JP): 思えば、黄金の隠し場所の話で盛り上がっていた時は付いていけず、少し退屈そうにしていたように思う。
Russian (RU): Если вспомнить, она не разделяла нашего возбуждения по поводу поиска запрятанного золота, потому, наверное, и слегка заскучала.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando você pensa sobre isso, ela não estava compartilhando da nossa empolgação enquanto falávamos da localização do ouro, então eu acho que ela estava um pouco entediada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 回想起來，在大家熱火朝天地談著黃金藏寶處的時候，她一直搭不上話，想必是有點寂寞吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 回想起来，在大家热火朝天地谈着黄金藏宝处的时候，她一直搭不上话，想必是有点寂寞吧。
Indonesian (IDN): Ngomong-ngomong, dia tampak agak bosan waktu kami sibuk membahas emas tersembunyi, mungkin karena dia tak bisa ikut terlibat.
Italian (IT): A ripensarci, sembrava un po' annoiata mentre noi eravamo esaltati per la storia dell'oro nascosto.
Turkish (TR): Düşündüğünüzde, altının saklı yeri hakkında konuştuğumuzda heyecanımızı paylaşmamıştı, bu yüzden sanırım biraz sıkılmıştı.

Umineko Project (UP): While eating the cookies Kumasawa‐san had baked, Jessica and I asked Maria this and that about black magic.
Steam (ST): While eating the cookies Kumasawa-san had baked, Jessica and I asked Maria this and that about black magic.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): While eating the cookies Kumasawa-san had baked, Jessica and I asked Maria this and that about black magic.

Steam (ST): Maria happily chatted away in response to our questions.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maria happily chatted away in response to our questions.

Umineko Project (UP): For each one, George‐aniki and Shannon‐chan would act surprised and agree with everything she said.
Steam (ST): Each time, George-aniki and Shannon-chan would act surprised or chime in.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): For each one, George-aniki and Shannon-chan would act surprised and agree with everything she said.
PC Japanese (JP): その度に譲治の兄貴と紗音ちゃんが驚いたり相槌を打ったりしてくれる。
Russian (RU): На любой из её ответов Джордж‐аники с Шаннон‐чан готовы были выказывать искреннее удивление и со всем соглашаться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Para cada uma, o George‐aniki e a Shannon‐chan agiam de forma surpresa e concordavam com tudo que ela dizia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 讓治大哥和紗音也在一旁隨聲附和，時而還作出驚訝的神情。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 让治大哥和纱音也在一旁随声附和，时而还作出惊讶的神情。

Italian (IT): Ogni volta che lo faceva, il fratellone George e Shannon-chan reagivano con sorpresa, e annuivano per mostrare la loro attenzione.
Turkish (TR): Her soruda George-aniki ve Shannon-chan da şaşırmış gibi davranıyor ve Maria'nın söylediği her şeyi onaylıyorlardı.

Umineko Project (UP): The color of the clouds in the sky grew progressively heavier, but the cousins really enjoyed communicating freely after one year of separation...
Steam (ST): The clouds in the sky grew darker and darker, but we cousins really enjoyed communicating freely after a year of separation...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The color of the clouds in the sky grew progressively heavier, but the cousins really enjoyed communicating freely after one year of separation...
PC Japanese (JP): 空の雲の色はますますに重たくなっていくが、いとこ同士の一年ぶりのコミュニケーションを存分に満喫するのだった…。
Russian (RU): Облака в небе наливались тяжестью, но родственники наслаждались разговором после года разлуки...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A cor das nuvens ficava cada vez mais cinza e pesada, mas os primos estavam se divertindo juntos por poderem conversar depois de um ano separados...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然天空中積云的顏色變得愈發昏暗，但是我們幾個堂兄妹還是把一年未敘的舊敘了個痛快…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然天空中积云的颜色变得愈发昏暗，但是我们几个堂兄妹还是把一年未叙的旧叙了个痛快…。

Italian (IT): Le nuvole in cielo si stavano sempre più scurendo, ma dopo un anno di assenza ci godemmo appieno una conversazione tra cugini...

Steam (ST): As George-aniki rubbed his forehead, he looked up at the sky.

Umineko Project (UP): Considering the color of the sky and the dampness of the air, raindrops could easily have started falling down at any moment.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Considering the color of the sky and the dampness of the air, it wouldn't have been odd for a raindrop to fall down.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Considerando a cor do céu e a umidade do ar, gotas de chuva poderiam facilmente começar a cair a qualquer momento.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 从天色和空气中那股潮湿的气味来看，随时都有可能下雨。

Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Uu-? Maria didn't feel a drop. Only Maria didn't. Uu-!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呜——？真里亚，没滴到。只有真里亚没有滴到水。呜——！」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然纱音坚持这是佣人的工作，但是不凑巧啊，赶在服务生之前把掉在地上的叉子捡起来，是我做人的原则。

Italian (IT): Shannon-chan fece per rifiutare, dicendo che questo era il lavoro di una domestica, ma sfortunatamente, raccogliere una forchetta caduta prima che lo faccia una cameriera è la mia ragione di vita.

Steam (ST): "...It looks like you're really out of time. It's okay if you head back first."

Original Witch Hunt (OG): This might be our last chance to see these beautiful roses... Tonight's typhoon was sure to ruin them...

Steam (ST): "These roses might be done in by tonight's winds."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "We tied a candy wrapper or something around it, tight. ...But Maria, if I remember correctly, it was growing right in front and really stood out, didn't it? Unless it grew legs and ran off somewhere, it must've been somewhere else. Aren't you just remembering it wrong?"
Steam (ST): "We tied a candy wrapper around it. ...But Maria, if I remember correctly, it was growing right in front and really stood out, didn't it? Unless it grew legs and ran off somewhere, it must've been somewhere else. Maybe you remembered it wrong."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "We wrapped a candy wrapper around it. ...But Maria, if I remember correctly, it was growing right in front and really stood out, didn't it? Unless it grew legs and ran off somewhere, it must have been somewhere else. Did Maria remember it wrong?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「飴玉かなんかの包み紙でキュっと。…しかし真里亞、確か俺の記憶が正しけりゃ、すぐ手前の目立つところに生えてたはずだぜ？　足が生えてどこかに行っちまったんじゃなきゃ、他の場所だったと思うぜ。真里亞の記憶違いじゃないのか？」
Russian (RU): "Мы крепко обвязали её чем‐то вроде фантика. ...Но Мария, если я правильно помню, она росла прямо напротив и сильно выделялась, не так ли? Если только она не отрастила ноги, и не убежала куда‐нибудь, то это — неправильное место. Может, ты перепутала?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Nós amarramos um papel de bala em volta dela. ...Mas, Maria, se eu me lembro bem, ela estava crescendo bem na frente e se destacava bastante, não? A não ser que ela tenha ganhado pernas e saído correndo, deve estar em algum lugar por aqui. Será que você não se enganou?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是用糖果之類的包裝紙綁了個結在上面。…可是真里亞呀，要是我沒記錯的話，應該就長這附近很顯眼的地方啊？我想它要不是自己長腳跑掉了，那就是在別處了哦。真里亞是不是記錯了啊？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是用糖果之类的包装纸绑了个结在上面。…可是真里亚呀，要是我没记错的话，应该就长这附近很显眼的地方啊？我想它要不是自己长脚跑掉了，那就是在别处了哦。真里亚是不是记错了啊？」
Indonesian (IDN): "Kami mengikat bungkus permen di tangkainya. ...Tapi Maria, kalau tidak salah, itu tumbuh tepat di depan dan sangat mencolok, kan? Kecuali mawar itu punya kaki dan lari ke mana-mana, pasti letaknya di tempat lain. Mungkin kamu salah ingat."
Italian (IT): "Ci abbiamo avvolto intorno l'incarto di una caramella... Ma se ben ricordo era proprio qui davanti e si notava molto, dico bene, Maria? Credo che, a meno che non le siano spuntate le gambe e sia scappata chissà dove, la rosa sia da qualche altra parte. Forse ti ricordi male?"
Turkish (TR): "Etrafına şeker ambalajı gibi bir şey bağlamıştık. ...Ama Maria, yanlış hatırlamıyorsam, tam ön tarafta büyüyordu ve gerçekten göze çarpıyordu, değil mi? Bacakları çıkıp bir yerlere kaçmadıysa, başka bir yerde olmalı. Maria, yanlış hatırlıyor olamaz mısın?"

Umineko Project (UP): I was a little surprised to see Auntie Rosa, who I had only ever seen as gentle, get angry.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): I was a little surprised to see Rosa oba-san, who I had only ever seen as gentle, get angry.
PC Japanese (JP): 温和なところしか見たことがない楼座叔母さんが怒るので、少し驚く。

Umineko Project (UP): Auntie Rosa slapped Maria's left cheek with her palm.{n}For that instant, Maria was shocked into silence.
Steam (ST): Aunt Rosa slapped Maria's left cheek with her palm. In that instant, Maria was shocked into silence.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa oba-san slapped Maria's left cheek with her palm. In that instant, Maria was shocked into silence.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座叔母さんが平手で真里亞の左頬を打つ。その瞬間だけ、真里亞の騒ぎが沈黙した。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 楼座叔母さんが平手で真里亞の左頬を打つ。{n}その瞬間だけ、真里亞の騒ぎが沈黙した。

Russian (RU): "............Я полагаю, любому неприятно, когда его наказывают на глазах у посторонних."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Eu não acho que qualquer pessoa gostaria de ser vista quando está apanhando assim."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………被罵的樣子，是不會想被人看到嘞。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………被骂的样子，是不会想被人看到嘞。」
Indonesian (IDN): ".........Nggak ada yang mau dilihat orang lain saat sedang dimarahi."
Italian (IT): "...Penso che a nessuno piaccia essere visti mentre si viene sgridati."
Turkish (TR): "............Hiç kimsenin cezalandırılırken görülmekten hoşlanacağını sanmıyorum."

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "Let's go. Let's return to the guesthouse. Then, after Maria‐chan comes back, let's welcome her as if nothing happened. ...That's...probably for the best, isn't it?"
Steam (ST): "Let's go. We'll return to the guesthouse. Then, after Maria-chan comes back, let's welcome her as if nothing happened. That's probably for the best, isn't it?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Let's go. Let's return to the guesthouse. Then, after Maria-chan comes back, let's welcome her as if nothing happened. That's probably for the best, isn't it?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「行こう。ゲストハウスへ戻ろう。そして真里亞ちゃんが戻ってきたら、何事もなかったかのように迎えてあげようよ。…それが、一番じゃないかい？」
Russian (RU): "Пойдёмте. Давайте вернёмся в домик для гостей. А затем, когда вернётся Мария‐чан, встретим её, как будто ничего не случилось. ...Наверное... так будет лучше, как думаете?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Vamos indo. Vamos voltar à casa de hóspedes. E então, quando a Maria‐chan voltar, vamos recebê‐la como se nada tivesse acontecido. ...Isso...provavelmente é o melhor a se fazer, certo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「走吧。回賓館去。然後等小真里亞回來的時候，裝作無事發生的樣子去迎接她。…這應該，是最好的應對方式了吧？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「走吧。回宾馆去。然后等小真里亚回来的时候，装作无事发生的样子去迎接她。…这应该，是最好的应对方式了吧？」
Indonesian (IDN): "Ayo kita pergi. Kita kembali ke rumah tamu. Lalu, saat Maria-chan kembali, kita sambut dia seperti nggak ada yang terjadi. Mungkin itu yang terbaik, kan?"
Italian (IT): "Andiamo. Torniamo alla dépendance. E quando Maria-chan tornerà, le daremo il bentornato come se non fosse successo nulla... Non è forse questa la cosa migliore da fare?"
Turkish (TR): "Hadi gidelim. Konukevine dönelim. Maria-chan döndükten sonra da, onu hiçbir şey olmamış gibi karşılayalım. ...Bu...muhtemelen en iyisi, değil mi?"

Umineko Project (UP): We thought that George‐aniki's point was probably correct, ...and if we could use that correct‐sounding reason to justify our retreat from this painful scene, that was probably enough for us.
Steam (ST): We thought George-aniki's point was probably a reasonable one, and we may have been eager to use that reasonable-sounding argument as a justification to retreat from this heart-rending scene.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because we thought that George-aniki's point was probably correct, ...we were fine with using that correct-sounding reason to justify retreating as long as it would ease the pain in our chests.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治の兄貴の言い分は多分もっともだと思ったし、…そういうもっともらしい理由をつけて、この胸の痛くなる場から退散できるなら、俺たちはそれでよかったのかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Мы чувствовали, что Джордж‐аники прав...... поэтому мы использовали его правду, чтобы избежать этой сложной сцены.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós pensamos que o argumento do George‐aniki provavelmente estava certo, ...e se nós pudéssemos usar essa argumento, provavelmente correto, como justificativa para nos retirarmos dessa cena dolorosa de se ver, seria o bastante para nós.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 想來，讓治大哥所說的大概是最合情理的，…能靠這個最合情理的理由，從這讓人心痛的地方脫身，說不定對我們來說也是最好的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 想来，让治大哥所说的大概是最合情理的，…能靠这个最合情理的理由，从这让人心痛的地方脱身，说不定对我们来说也是最好的。
Indonesian (IDN): Kami pikir pendapat George-aniki itu memang masuk akal, dan mungkin kami pun sedang mencari alasan logis untuk bisa mundur dari pemandangan yang menyayat hati itu.
Italian (IT): Pensammo che l'argomentazione del fratellone George potesse avere senso...{n}e forse eravamo felici di usare tale ragione per filare via da quella scena straziante.
Turkish (TR): George-aniki'nin söylediklerinin muhtemelen doğru olduğunu düşündük, ...ve bu kulağa doğru gelen nedeni bu acı verici sahneden çekilmemizi haklı çıkarmak için kullanabilirsek, bu muhtemelen bizim için yeterliydi.

Umineko Project (UP): Jessica and I nodded at George‐aniki, and we all left.
Steam (ST): Jessica and I nodded at George-aniki, and we all left.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Jessica and I nodded at George-aniki, and we all left.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺と朱志香は、譲治兄貴に頷き、その場を後にする。
Russian (RU): Джессика и я кивнули Джорджу‐аники, и мы ушли.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Jessica e eu olhamos para o George‐aniki, e fomos embora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我和朱志香，朝讓治大哥點了下頭，決定離開此地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我和朱志香，朝让治大哥点了下头，决定离开此地。
Indonesian (IDN): Jessica dan aku mengangguk pada George-aniki, dan kami pun pergi.
Italian (IT): Io e Jessica gli annuimmo, e ci allontanammo da lì.
Turkish (TR): Jessica ve ben başımızı onaylar şekilde salladık ve hepimiz oradan ayrıldık.

Umineko Project (UP): We called towards Maria that we were going to head to the guesthouse, but since it didn't seem to reach her ears, we felt guilty and shameless even saying it...
Steam (ST): We called towards Maria, telling her that we were going to head to the guesthouse, but she didn't seem to hear, and we felt sort of guilty and shameless after saying it...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): We called towards Maria that we were going to head to the guesthouse, but since it didn't seem to reach her ears, we also had shamelessly guilty consciences...
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞に、俺たちはゲストハウスに行ってるからなと声を掛けるが、耳には届いていないようだったし、言っている俺たちもどこか後ろめたくて白々しかった…。
Russian (RU): Мы крикнули Марии, что направляемся в дом для гостей, но так как было не похоже, что она нас услышала, это тоже осталось на нашей совести...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós falamos para a Maria que estávamos indo para a casa de hóspedes, mas como parece que isso não chegou aos ouvidos dela, nós nos sentimos culpados mesmo tendo dito isso...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我們朝真里亞說了聲我們先回賓館了，可她好像沒有聽到，說這話的我們也是既內疚又自覺虛偽…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我们朝真里亚说了声我们先回宾馆了，可她好像没有听到，说这话的我们也是既内疚又自觉虚伪…。
Indonesian (IDN): Kami memanggil Maria, bilang kami akan ke rumah tamu, tapi dia sepertinya tidak mendengar, dan kami pun merasa agak bersalah dan malu setelah mengatakannya...
Italian (IT): Avvisammo Maria che ci stavamo dirigendo verso la dépendance, ma non sembrò averci sentito, e provammo un senso di colpa nel dirlo con tale sfacciataggine...
Turkish (TR): Maria'ya konukevine gideceğimizi söyledik, ama bu onun kulağına gitmediği için, bunu söylerken bile kendimizi suçlu ve utanmaz hissettik...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Umineko Project (UP): "In that case, look by yourself as much as you want! Mama doesn't care!!"
Steam (ST): "In that case, look by yourself as much as you want! Mama doesn't care!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「それなら好きなだけひとりで探しなさい！　ママは知りませんッ！！」
Russian (RU): "В таком случае оставайся здесь сколько хочешь! Маме всё равно!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Nesse caso, procure sozinha o quanto quiser! A mamãe não se importa!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那你就自己一個人找個夠吧！媽媽不管了！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那你就自己一个人找个够吧！妈妈不管了！！」
Indonesian (IDN): "Kalau begitu, cari sendiri sepuasnya! Mama nggak peduli!!"
Italian (IT): "Allora cercatela da sola quanto ti pare! A mamma non importa!!"
Turkish (TR): "Bu durumda, istediğin kadar kendi başına ara! Annenin umurunda değil!!"

Umineko Project (UP): "Uu!!! Look for it! I'll look for it by myself!! Look for it even if Mama doesn't care! Uu‐uu‐uu‐uu‐uu!!"
Steam (ST): "Uu-!!! I'll look for it! I'll look for it by myself!! Even if Mama doesn't care! Uu-uu-uu-uu-uu-!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Uu-!!! Look for it! Maria will look for it by herself!! Will look for it even if Mama doesn't care! Uu-uu-uu-uu-uu-!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「うー！！！　探す！　真里亞がひとりで探すー！！　ママが知らなくても探す！　うーうーうーうーうー！！！」
Russian (RU): "У‐у!!! Найду её! Я сама её найду!!! Буду искать её, даже если маме всё равно! У‐у‐у‐у‐у‐у‐у‐у‐у‐у!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uu!!! Procure por ela! Vou procurar por ela sozinha!! A Maria vai procurar por ela mesmo que a mamãe não se importe! Uu‐uu‐uu‐uu‐uu!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗚——！！！找！真里亞一個人找——！！媽媽不管照樣找！嗚——嗚——嗚——嗚——嗚——！！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呜——！！！找！真里亚一个人找——！！妈妈不管照样找！呜——呜——呜——呜——呜——！！！」
Indonesian (IDN): "Uu-!!! Aku akan cari! Aku cari sendiri!! Meskipun Mama nggak peduli! Uu-uu-uu-uu-uu-!!"
Italian (IT): "Uuh!!! La cercherà! Maria la cercherà da sola!! La cercherà anche se a mamma non importa! Uuh, uuh, uuh, uuh, uuh!!"

Umineko Project (UP): "Have it your way!!"
Steam (ST): "Have it your way!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「随便你！！」

Italian (IT): "Fai come vuoi!!"

Umineko Project (UP): After blasting her with those last few words, Rosa spun on her heels and quickly returned to the mansion.
Steam (ST): After blasting her with those last few words, Rosa spun on her heels and quickly returned to the mansion.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座はその言葉を最後にぶつけると、ぐるりと踵を返して屋敷へ足早に戻っていく。
Russian (RU): Бросив эти последние слова, Роза повернулась и быстрым шагом направилась в особняк.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após explodir com aquelas últimas palavras, Rosa deu as costas e rapidamente retornou à mansão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座最後甩下這句話，轉過身去快步走向大屋。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座最后甩下这句话，转过身去快步走向大屋。
Indonesian (IDN): Setelah mengucapkan kata-kata pedas itu, Rosa berbalik dan cepat-cepat kembali ke mansion.
Italian (IT): Dopo averle lanciato quelle ultime parole, Rosa girò i tacchi e ritornò subito alla villa.
Turkish (TR): Rosa, Maria'yı bu son birkaç kelimeyle patakladıktan sonra topuklarının üzerinde döndü ve hızla malikaneye döndü.

Umineko Project (UP): Maria probably viewed that as a cold, hurtful gesture.
Steam (ST): Maria probably viewed that as a cold gesture meant to injure.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maria probably viewed that as a cold gesture meant to injure.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞にとってそれは、とても冷たく傷つく仕草に見えただろう。
Russian (RU): Мария, возможно, могла расценить этот холодный жест как стремление обидеть её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Maria provavelmente viu isso como um gesto frio e ofensivo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這在真里亞看來，是非常冷酷而傷人的舉動吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这在真里亚看来，是非常冷酷而伤人的举动吧。
Indonesian (IDN): Maria mungkin menganggap itu sebagai sikap dingin yang menyakitkan.
Italian (IT): Maria probabilmente lo vide come un gesto freddo per ferirla.
Turkish (TR): Maria muhtemelen bunu soğuk ve incitici bir hareket olarak gördü.

Umineko Project (UP): But from Rosa's perspective, that was not her intention.
Steam (ST): But that wasn't Rosa's intention.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But from Rosa's perspective, that was not her intention.
PC Japanese (JP): だが楼座にしてみればそういうつもりではなかった。
Russian (RU): Но подобное не входило в намерение Розы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas, da perspectiva de Rosa, essa não era a sua intenção.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是樓座並不是這個意思。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是楼座并不是这个意思。
Indonesian (IDN): Tapi itu bukan maksud Rosa.
Italian (IT): Ma non era quella l'intenzione di Rosa...
Turkish (TR): Ama Rosa'nın bakış açısına göre, onun niyeti bu değildi.

Umineko Project (UP): ...It was because the hand which she had so emotionally struck Maria's cheek with was still numb.
Steam (ST): ...It was because the hand with which she had so emotionally struck Maria's cheek...was still numb.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …感情的に頬を叩いてしまった手が、まだじんじんしていたから。
Russian (RU): ...Потому что ладонь, которой она в порыве эмоций ударила Марию по щеке, всё ещё немела.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Isso porque, a mão que ela usou para bater na Maria ainda estava paralisada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …她這麼做，是因為氣急了打在女兒臉上的手，還在隱隱作痛。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …她这么做，是因为气急了打在女儿脸上的手，还在隐隐作痛。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Itu karena tangan yang dia gunakan untuk menampar pipi Maria dengan emosi tadi... masih terasa kebas.
Italian (IT): Il motivo era che la mano con cui aveva colpito per la rabbia la guancia di Maria era ancora dolorante.
Turkish (TR): ...Çünkü Maria'nın yanağına duygusal bir şekilde vurduğu eli hala uyuşuktu.

Umineko Project (UP): ...It was because, if she stayed there screaming, she might again be taken over by her emotions, and continue slapping her daughter's cheek over and over.
Steam (ST): ...It was because, if she stayed there screaming, she might again be taken over by her emotions and continue slapping her daughter's cheek over and over.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was because, if she stayed there screaming, she might again be taken over by her emotions and continue slapping her daughter's cheek over and over.
PC Japanese (JP): …このまま叫び続けていると、また感情に飲み込まれて、娘の頬を何度も打ってしまいそうだったから。
Russian (RU): ...Потому что продолжи она оставаться там и кричать, её снова могли бы захлестнуть эмоции, и она снова и снова продолжала бы хлестать свою дочь по щеке.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Por isso, se ela ficasse lá gritando, ela poderia ser tomada por suas emoções e continuar a bater em sua filha cada vez mais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …是因為如果再像這樣一直喊下去，任憑憤怒的感情吞沒自己的話，不知道會再痛打女兒多少下。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …是因为如果再像这样一直喊下去，任凭愤怒的感情吞没自己的话，不知道会再痛打女儿多少下。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Itu karena kalau dia tetap di sana dan terus berteriak, dia mungkin akan terbawa emosi lagi dan terus menampar pipi anaknya.
Italian (IT): Perché se fosse rimasta lì a gridare avrebbe potuto farsi di nuovo prendere dalle emozioni, e avrebbe finito per schiaffeggiare ripetutamente le guance di sua figlia.
Turkish (TR): ...Çünkü orada bağırmaya devam ederse, yine duygularının esiri olabilir ve kızının yanağına defalarca tokat atmaya devam edebilirdi.

Umineko Project (UP): After Rosa left, only Maria was left in the rose garden, all alone.
Steam (ST): After Rosa left, Maria was left alone in the rose garden.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After Rosa left, only Maria was left alone in the rose garden.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座が立ち去った後の薔薇庭園には、真里亞がたったひとりで残される。
Russian (RU): После ухода Розы Мария осталась в розарии в полном одиночестве.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após Rosa sair, Maria foi a única que restou no jardim de rosas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座離去後的玫瑰庭園裡，只剩下真里亞一個人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座离去后的玫瑰庭园里，只剩下真里亚一个人。
Indonesian (IDN): Setelah Rosa pergi, Maria sendirian di taman mawar.
Italian (IT): Dopo che Rosa se ne andò, Maria rimase da sola nel roseto.
Turkish (TR): Rosa gittikten sonra gül bahçesinde sadece Maria kalmıştı, yapayalnız.

Umineko Project (UP): The wind began to blow stronger and stronger, and every once in a while, a raindrop would fall on her forehead.
Steam (ST): The wind began to blow stronger and stronger, and every once in a while, a raindrop would fall on her forehead.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The wind began to blow stronger and stronger, and every once in a while, a raindrop would fall on her forehead.
PC Japanese (JP): 風はますますに強くなり始め、時折、額に雨粒がぼたりと当たった。
Russian (RU): Ветер набирал силу, и в это же время редкие капли дождя окропили её лоб.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O vento começou a soprar cada vez mais forte e, aos poucos, gotas de chuva foram caindo em sua testa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 風越刮越大，時而額頭還會滴到雨滴。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 风越刮越大，时而额头还会滴到雨滴。
Indonesian (IDN): Angin bertiup semakin kencang, dan sesekali, tetes hujan jatuh di dahinya.
Italian (IT): Il vento cominciò a soffiare sempre più forte, e ogni tanto, una goccia di pioggia cadeva sulla sua fronte...
Turkish (TR): Rüzgar gittikçe daha güçlü esmeye başladı ve arada bir alnına bir yağmur damlası düşüyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): ...However, Maria couldn't leave that place.{n}Not until she found that poor, withering rose.
Steam (ST): ...However, Maria couldn't leave that place. Not until she found that poor, wilting rose.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...However, Maria couldn't leave that place. Not until she found that poor, withering rose.
PC Japanese (JP): …でも、真里亞はその場所を立ち去ることができない。あの、可哀想な萎れた薔薇を見つけるまでは。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …でも、真里亞はその場所を立ち去ることができない。{n}あの、可哀想な萎れた薔薇を見つけるまでは。
Russian (RU): ...Однако Мария не могла уйти.{n}Только после того, как она разыщет ту розу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...No entanto, a Maria não podia deixar aquele lugar.{n}Não até encontrar a pobre e seca rosa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …但是，真里亞不能離開這裡。{n}直到找到那支可怜的枯萎的玫瑰為止。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …但是，真里亚不能离开这里。{n}直到找到那支可怜的枯萎的玫瑰为止。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Tapi Maria tak bisa meninggalkan tempat itu. Tidak sampai dia menemukan mawar kecil yang layu itu.
Italian (IT): Tuttavia, Maria non poteva andarsene da lì. Non finché non avrebbe trovato quella povera rosa appassita.
Turkish (TR): ...Ancak Maria oradan ayrılamıyordu.{n}Ta ki o zavallı, solan gülü bulana kadar.

Umineko Project (UP): It had definitely been there. ......And yet, it wasn't there.{n}Even though she knew the place, and even though this was it, it wasn't there.
Steam (ST): It had definitely been there. ......Even so, it wasn't. Even though she knew the place and even though it had been there, it wasn't.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It had definitely been there.......Even so, it wasn't. Even though she knew the place and even though it had been there,it wasn't.
PC Japanese (JP): 間違いなくそれはここにあった。……なのに、ない。場所はわかっていて、しかもそれはそこなのに、ない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 間違いなくそれはここにあった。……なのに、ない。{n}場所はわかっていて、しかもそれはそこなのに、ない。
Russian (RU): Она точно была там. ......Но её всё ещё нет.{n}Несмотря на то, что Мария знала место, и даже полагала, что роза была там, её не было.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela definitivamente estava lá. ......E mesmo assim, ela não estava lá.{n}Mesmo sabendo o lugar, mesmo sabendo que estava lá, ela não estava lá.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 毫無疑問它應該就在這裡。……可是，沒有。{n}明明知道是在這裡，卻沒有。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 毫无疑问它应该就在这里。……可是，没有。{n}明明知道是在这里，却没有。
Indonesian (IDN): Itu benar-benar ada di sana. ......Tapi sekarang, tidak ada. Padahal dia tahu tempatnya, dan memang tadi ada, sekarang tidak ada.
Italian (IT): Doveva sicuramente trovarsi lì... Eppure, non c'era. Pur conoscendone il luogo, e sapendo che la rosa doveva essere lì, non c'era.
Turkish (TR): Kesinlikle oradaydı. ......Ama yine de, orada değildi.{n}Konumunu bilmesine ve burası olduğuna emin olmasına rağmen, orada değildi.

Umineko Project (UP): Maria, while bitterly staring at the place it was supposed to be, thought frantically.
Steam (ST): Maria bitterly stared at the place it was supposed to be and thought frantically.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maria, while bitterly staring at the place it was supposed to be, thought frantically.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞は恨めしそうに、あったはずの場所を睨み続けながら、必死に考える。
Russian (RU): Мария, лихорадочно размышляя, с горечью смотрела на то место, где должна была находиться её роза.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Maria olhava amargamente para onde a rosa supostamente estava, pensando freneticamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真里亞一臉怨氣，死死盯著玫瑰應該在的地點，拚命地思考著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真里亚一脸怨气，死死盯着玫瑰应该在的地点，拼命地思考着。
Indonesian (IDN): Maria menatap tempat itu dengan getir dan berpikir keras.
Italian (IT): Mentre fissava amareggiata il punto dove avrebbe dovuto esserci la rosa, Maria pensò freneticamente.
Turkish (TR): Maria, gülün olması gereken yere acı acı bakarken, çılgınca düşündü.

Umineko Project (UP): Maybe the angle I'm looking from is wrong.{n}Maybe the height I'm looking from is wrong.
Steam (ST): Maybe the angle I'm looking from is wrong. Maybe the height I'm looking from is wrong.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maybe the angle I'm looking from is wrong. Maybe the height I'm looking from is wrong.
PC Japanese (JP): 見る角度がおかしいのではないか。見る高さがおかしいのではないか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 見る角度がおかしいのではないか。{n}見る高さがおかしいのではないか。
Russian (RU): Может быть, я смотрю не с того угла.{n}Может быть, я смотрю не с той высоты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez o ângulo que eu estou procurando está errado?{n}Talvez eu esteja olhando na altura errada?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 是不是看的角度不對。{n}是不是看的高度不對。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 是不是看的角度不对。{n}是不是看的高度不对。
Indonesian (IDN): Mungkin sudut pandangnya salah. Mungkin tinggi pandangannya yang keliru.
Italian (IT): Magari era sbagliato l'angolo da cui guardava. Magari era sbagliata l'altezza da cui guardava...
Turkish (TR): Belki de baktığım açı yanlıştır.{n}Belki de baktığım yükseklik yanlıştır.

Umineko Project (UP): ......While gazing at a single point, Maria repeatedly changed her position and continued to stare.
Steam (ST): ......While gazing at a single point, Maria repeatedly stood up, changed her position and continued to stare.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......While gazing at a single point, Maria repeatedly stood up, changed her position and continued to stare.
PC Japanese (JP): ……たった一点を凝視しながら、真里亞は何度も立ち位置を変えては睨み続ける。
Russian (RU): ......Глядя в одну точку, Мария неоднократно меняла свою положение и продолжала смотреть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Enquanto encarava o mesmo ponto, Maria repetidamente mudou sua posição e continuou a encarar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……真里亞凝視著那一個點，不斷地改變站立的位置盯著它。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……真里亚凝视着那一个点，不断地改变站立的位置盯着它。
Indonesian (IDN): ......Sambil menatap satu titik, Maria berdiri, mengubah posisi, dan terus menatap.
Italian (IT): Mentre scrutava quel singolo punto, Maria cambiava più e più volte la sua posizione, e continuava a fissarlo.
Turkish (TR): ......Tek bir noktaya bakarken, Maria defalarca pozisyonunu değiştirdi ve bakmaya devam etti.

Umineko Project (UP): The wind was getting increasingly stronger......
Steam (ST): The wind was getting stronger and stronger......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The wind was getting increasingly stronger......
PC Japanese (JP): 風はますますに強くなり始める……。
Russian (RU): Ветер становился всё сильнее......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O vento estava ficando cada vez mais forte......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 風越刮越大……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 风越刮越大……。
Indonesian (IDN): Angin bertiup makin kencang......
Italian (IT): Il vento si stava facendo sempre più forte...
Turkish (TR): Rüzgâr gittikçe şiddetleniyordu......

Umineko Project (UP): But Maria kept on looking for that rose in front of the flower bed...
Steam (ST): But Maria kept on looking for that rose in front of the flower bed...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But Maria kept on looking for that rose in front of the flower bed...
PC Japanese (JP): でも真里亞はいつまでも花壇の前で、あの薔薇を探し続けているのだった…。
Russian (RU): Но Мария продолжала выискивать свою розу, стоя перед клумбой...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas Maria continuou procurando pela rosa em frente ao canteiro de flores...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可真里亞卻一直在花壇前，不停尋找著那支玫瑰…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可真里亚却一直在花坛前，不停寻找着那支玫瑰…。
Indonesian (IDN): Tapi Maria tetap mencari mawar itu di depan petak bunga...
Italian (IT): Ma Maria continuò a cercare quella rosa di fronte all'aiuola...
Turkish (TR): Ama Maria çiçek yatağının önündeki gülü aramaya devam etti...

Umineko Project (UP): .........Kinzo noticed the sound of the raindrops beating on the window.{n}It had finally started to rain.{n}It had begun later than the weather report had predicted.
Steam (ST): .........Kinzo noticed the sound of the raindrops beating on the window. It seemed to be pouring down thickly. It had begun to rain later than the weather report had predicted.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): .........Kinzo noticed the sound of the raindrops beating on the window. It seemed to be pouring down thickly. It had begun to rain later than the weather report had predicted.
PC Japanese (JP): ………金蔵は窓を叩く雨粒の音に気付く。とうとう降り出したらしい。天気予報で予想していたよりは遅い降り出しであった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ………金蔵は窓を叩く雨粒の音に気付く。{n}とうとう降り出したらしい。{n}天気予報で予想していたよりは遅い降り出しであった。
Russian (RU): .........Кинзо заметил, что капли дождя барабанят по окну.{n}Похоже, всё‐таки пошёл дождь.{n}Значительно позже, чем передавалось по прогнозу погоды.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Kinzo percebeu o som das gotas de chuva batendo na janela.{n}Finalmente começou a chover.{n}Começou mais tarde do que o serviço meteorológico havia previsto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………打在窗上的雨聲引起了金藏的注意。{n}看來終於開始下雨了。{n}比天氣預報所說的時間是要晚了很多。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………打在窗上的雨声引起了金藏的注意。{n}看来终于开始下雨了。{n}比天气预报所说的时间是要晚了很多。
Indonesian (IDN): .........Kinzo menyadari suara tetesan hujan yang menghantam jendela. Tampaknya hujan turun dengan deras. Hujan mulai turun lebih lambat dari yang diperkirakan oleh laporan cuaca.
Italian (IT): ...Kinzo si accorse del rumore delle gocce di pioggia, le quali picchiettavano la finestra. A quanto pareva, stava piovendo a catinelle. La pioggia era iniziata a scendere più tardi di quanto il bollettino meteo avesse previsto.
Turkish (TR): .........Kinzo pencereye vuran yağmur damlalarının sesini fark etti.{n}Sonunda yağmur yağmaya başlamıştı.{n}Hava raporunun tahmin ettiğinden daha geç başlamıştı.

Umineko Project (UP): Kinzo, as if being summoned by the sound of the rain, approached the window.{n}The sound of the rain is a sound of silence.
Steam (ST): Kinzo approached the window as if being summoned by the sound of the rain. The sound of rain is a sound of silence.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kinzo, as if being summoned by the sound of the rain, approached the window. The sound of the rain is a sound of silence.
PC Japanese (JP): 金蔵は雨音に誘われるように窓辺へ近付く。雨の音は静寂の音。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 金蔵は雨音に誘われるように窓辺へ近付く。{n}雨の音は静寂の音。
Russian (RU): Кинзо, словно привлечённый звуком дождя, приблизился к окну.{n}Звук дождя — звук тишины.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kinzo, como se tivesse sido invocado pelo som da chuva, se aproximou da janela.{n}O som da chuva é o som do silêncio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 金藏像是被雨吸引，走近窗邊。{n}雨聲是靜寂之聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 金藏像是被雨吸引，走近窗边。{n}雨声是静寂之声。
Indonesian (IDN): Kinzo mendekati jendela seolah terpanggil oleh suara hujan itu. Suara hujan adalah suara dari keheningan.
Italian (IT): Kinzo si avvicinò alla finestra, come attirato dallo scrosciare della pioggia. Era un suono placido.
Turkish (TR): Kinzo, sanki yağmurun sesiyle çağrılmış gibi pencereye yaklaştı.{n}Yağmurun sesi sessizliğin sesidir.

Umineko Project (UP): That sound feels quieter than any silence, and makes humans remember that, in the end, they are alone from when they are born to when they die.
Steam (ST): That sound feels quieter than any silence... and makes humans remember that, in the end, they are alone from the moment they're born to the moment they die.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That sound feels quieter than any silence and makes humans remember that, in the end, they are alone from when they are born to when they die.
PC Japanese (JP): その音はどんな静けさよりも静寂を感じさせ、人間など結局は生まれてから死ぬまで孤独でしかないことを思い出させてくれる。
Russian (RU): Этот звук гораздо тише любой тишины и заставляет людей помнить, что в конце концов они рождаются и умирают в одиночестве.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aquele som parecia mais quieto do que qualquer silêncio, e fazia os humanos se lembrarem de que, no final, eles estão sozinhos desde seu nascimento até o momento de sua morte.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這種聲音比何種寂靜還要來得更為寂靜，讓人回想起，人類從出生到死亡本就只有孤獨。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这种声音比何种寂静还要来得更为寂静，让人回想起，人类从出生到死亡本就只有孤独。
Indonesian (IDN): Suara itu terasa lebih sunyi dari kesunyian apa pun... dan membuat manusia ingat bahwa, pada akhirnya, mereka sendirian dari saat lahir hingga saat mati.
Italian (IT): Un suono che sembrava più quieto di qualsiasi silenzio, e che ricordava agli esseri umani che in fin dei conti, essi erano soli dal momento della loro nascita fino a quello della loro morte.
Turkish (TR): Bu ses tüm sessizliklerden daha sessizdir, ve insana, doğduğu andan öldüğü ana kadar yalnız olduğunu hatırlatır.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Umineko Project (UP): "......You're late, {f:5:Beatrice}."
Steam (ST): "......You're late, {f:5:Beatrice}."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......You're late, Beatrice."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……遅かったではないか、ベアトリーチェ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……遅かったではないか、ベアトリーチェ」
Russian (RU): "......Ты припозднилась, {f:5:Беатриче}."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Você está atrasada, {f:5:Beatrice}."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……怎麼來得這麼晚啊，貝阿朵莉切？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……怎么来得这么晚啊，贝阿朵莉切？」
Indonesian (IDN): "......Kau terlambat, {f:5:Beatrice}."
Italian (IT): "...Sembra che tu sia in ritardo, {f:5:Beatrice}."
Turkish (TR): "......Geç kaldın, {f:5:Beatrice}."

Umineko Project (UP): Were those words directed at the rainy sky...?{n}No one could be seen in the direction of Kinzo's gaze.
Steam (ST): Were those words directed at the rainy sky...? There was no one to be seen in the direction of Kinzo's gaze.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Were those words directed at the rainy sky...? No one could be seen in the direction of Kinzo's gaze.
PC Japanese (JP): その言葉は降雨の空に告げたもの…？金蔵の眼差しの先に応える者の姿はない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その言葉は降雨の空に告げたもの…？{n}金蔵の眼差しの先に応える者の姿はない。
Russian (RU): Были ли эти слова обращены в дождливое небо?..{n}Там, куда смотрел Кинзо, никого не было.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aquelas palavras haviam sido direcionadas ao céu chuvoso...?{n}Ninguém podia ver para qual direção Kinzo estava olhando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此話是向正在下雨的空中所說…？{n}在金藏視線的前方連半個人影都沒有。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此话是向正在下雨的空中所说…？{n}在金藏视线的前方连半个人影都没有。
Indonesian (IDN): Apakah kata-kata itu ditujukan pada langit yang diguyur hujan...? Tak ada siapa pun yang terlihat ke arah pandangan Kinzo.
Italian (IT): Quelle parole erano forse dirette al cielo carico di pioggia...? Dove Kinzo stava guardando, non c'era nessuno che potesse rispondere.
Turkish (TR): Bu sözler yağmurlu gökyüzüne mi yönelikti...?{n}Kinzo'nun baktığı yönde kimse görünmüyordu.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Umineko Project (UP): "......So, shall we begin? Our banquet of miracles. ......In this very moment, this island has been cut off from the world. Now there are none who can interrupt my ritual."
Steam (ST): "......Well then, let us begin. Let us begin our banquet of miracles. ......This island has now been cut off from the world. Now there are none who can interrupt my ceremony.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......So, shall we start? Let us begin our banquet of miracles. ......Even now this island has been cut off from the world. Now there is no one who can interrupt my ceremony.
PC Japanese (JP): 「……さぁ、始めようではないか。私とお前の、奇跡の宴を。……今こそこの島は現世より切り離された。もう誰も、私の儀式の邪魔をすることはできぬ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……さぁ、始めようではないか。私とお前の、奇跡の宴を。……今こそこの島は現世より切り離された。もう誰も、私の儀式の邪魔をすることはできぬ」
Russian (RU): "......Что ж, начнём? Наш пир чудес. ......Теперь этот остров отрезан от внешнего мира. Теперь никто не сможет помешать моему ритуалу."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Então, devemos começar? O nosso banquete dos milagres. ......Neste exato momento, esta ilha foi isolada do resto do mundo. Agora ninguém mais pode interromper o meu ritual."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……來吧，開始吧。開始我和你的，奇跡之宴。……現在這島已從現世中切離開來了。已經沒有人可以來妨礙我的儀式了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……来吧，开始吧。开始我和你的，奇迹之宴。……现在这岛已从现世中切离开来了。已经没有人可以来妨碍我的仪式了。」
Indonesian (IDN): "......Kalau begitu, mari kita mulai. Mari kita mulai jamuan keajaiban kita. ......Pulau ini sekarang telah terputus dari dunia luar. Kini tak ada lagi yang bisa mengganggu upacaraku.
Italian (IT): "...Allora, vogliamo cominciare? Diamo inizio al nostro banchetto dei miracoli... Adesso quest'isola è stata tagliata fuori dal mondo. Ormai nessuno potrà interferire nella mia cerimonia."
Turkish (TR): "......Peki o zaman, başlayalım mı? Mucizeler bizim ziyafetimiz. ......Şu anda, bu adanın dünyayla bağlantısı kesildi. Artık ritüelimi engelleyebilecek kimse yok."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Umineko Project (UP): "There are many fitting sacrifices for you. Four of my children. Three of their companions. Four of my grandchildren. Me and my guests and my servants! You may eat up as many as you please."
Steam (ST): There are many fitting sacrifices for you. Four of my children. Three of their companions. Four of my grandchildren. Me and my guests and my servants! You may devour as many as you please.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): There are many fitting sacrifices for you. Four of my children. Three of their companions. Four of my grandchildren. Me and my guests and my servants! You may eat up as many as you please.
PC Japanese (JP): お前に相応しい生贄は充分にあるぞ。息子たちが４人。その伴侶が３人。孫たちが４人。私に客に使用人たち！　どれでも好きなだけ食らうがいい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「お前に相応しい生贄は充分にあるぞ。息子たちが４人。その伴侶が３人。孫たちが４人。私に客に使用人たち！　どれでも好きなだけ食らうがいい」
Russian (RU): "Для тебя собрано достаточно подходящих жертв. Четверо моих детей. Трое их спутников. Четверо моих внуков. Я, мои гости и мои слуги! Ты можешь есть, сколько хочешь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Tem muitos sacrifícios apropriados para você. Quatro dos meus filhos. Três de seus companheiros. Quatro de meus netos. Eu, meu convidado e meus serviçais! Você pode comer quantos você quiser."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「適合你的活祭多得是。我的兒女四人。他們的配偶三人。孫子孫女四人。還有我、客人、傭人們！不管哪個想怎麼吃就怎麼吃吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「适合你的活祭多得是。我的儿女四人。他们的配偶三人。孙子孙女四人。还有我、客人、佣人们！不管哪个想怎么吃就怎么吃吧。」
Indonesian (IDN): Ada banyak sekali korban yang pantas untukmu. Empat anakku. Tiga pasangan mereka. Empat cucuku. Aku sendiri, para tamuku, dan para pelayanku! Kau boleh melahap sebanyak yang kau mau.
Italian (IT): "Ci sono molti sacrifici perfetti per te. Quattro dei miei figli. Tre dei loro compagni. Quattro dei miei nipoti. Me, i miei ospiti ed i miei domestici! Puoi divorarne quanti ne vuoi."
Turkish (TR): "Senin için çok uygun kurbanlar var. Çocuklarımdan dördü. Arkadaşlarımdan üçü. Torunlarımdan dördü. Ben, misafirlerim ve hizmetkârlarım! İstediğin kadar yiyebilirsin."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Umineko Project (UP): "The key of fate will select the sacrifices in accordance with the Demons' Roulette. If that roulette chooses me, even I will become your sacrifice. ......However, because of that...because I will bet on that madness, ......I will definitely create a grand miracle."
Steam (ST): The key of fate will select the sacrifices in accordance with the Demons' Roulette. If that roulette chooses me, even I will become your sacrifice. ...However, because of that, ...because I will bet on such madness, ......I will most assuredly bring forth a grand miracle."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The key of fate will select the sacrifices in accordance with the Demons' Roulette. If that roulette chooses me, even I will become your sacrifice. ...However, because of that... because I will bet on that madness,......I will definitely create a grand miracle.
PC Japanese (JP): 運命の鍵は、悪魔のルーレットに従い生贄を選ぶであろう。そのルーレットが私を選ぶならば、私すらもお前の生贄となろう。……だが、だからこそなのだ…。それだけの狂気を賭けるからこそ、……私は必ずや偉大な奇跡を起こすだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「運命の鍵は、悪魔のルーレットに従い生贄を選ぶであろう。そのルーレットが私を選ぶならば、私すらもお前の生贄となろう。……だが、だからこそなのだ…。それだけの凶気を賭けるからこそ、……私は必ずや偉大な奇跡を起こすだろう」
Russian (RU): "Ключ судьбы изберёт жертвы, повинуясь дьявольской рулетке. Если эта рулетка выберет меня, то даже я стану твоей жертвой. ......Однако из‐за этого... из‐за того, что я делаю ставку на это безумие......... я, безусловно, создам великое чудо."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "A chave do destino vai selecionar os sacrifícios de acordo com a Roleta dos Demônios. Se a roleta me escolher, mesmo eu me tornarei o seu sacrifício. ......No entanto, por causa disso...porque eu aposto nessa loucura, ......eu definitivamente vou criar um grande milagre."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「命運的鑰匙，將會遵從惡魔的輪盤賭來挑選活祭。輪盤要是選中了我，我也會成為你的活祭。……但是，正因為如此…。正因為是如此瘋狂的賭博，……我才必定會引發偉大的奇跡。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「命运的钥匙，将会遵从恶魔的轮盘赌来挑选活祭。轮盘要是选中了我，我也会成为你的活祭。……但是，正因为如此…。正因为是如此疯狂的赌博，……我才必定会引发伟大的奇迹。」
Indonesian (IDN): Kunci takdir akan memilih korban sesuai dengan Roulette Iblis. Jika roulette itu memilihku, maka aku pun akan menjadi korbanmu. ...Namun, justru karena itulah, ...karena aku akan bertaruh pada kegilaan semacam itu, ......aku pasti akan membawa keajaiban besar ke dunia ini."
Italian (IT): "Seguendo le regole della Roulette Demoniaca, sarà la chiave del fato a scegliere i sacrifici. Se quella roulette mi sceglierà, persino io diventerò un tuo sacrificio... Ma proprio per questo... Proprio per aver scommesso in modo tanto folle...{n}io farò sì che avvenga senz'altro un grande miracolo..."
Turkish (TR): "Kaderin anahtarı kurbanları İblislerin Ruleti'ne göre seçecek. Eğer o rulet beni seçerse, ben bile kurbanın olurum. ......Ancak, bu nedenle...bu nedenle bu çılgınlığa bahse gireceğim, ......kesinlikle büyük bir mucize yaratacağım."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Umineko Project (UP): "...Come, devour as much as you wish...!! I will overcome that roulette. Yes, I'll put everything on the line. First, I will return the headship of the Ushiromiya family. Take it!!"
Steam (ST): "...Come, devour to your heart's content...!! I will achieve victory over that roulette. Yes, I'll put everything on the line. First, I'll return the inheritance of the Ushiromiya family. Accept it!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Come, devour as much as you wish...!! I will overcome that roulette. Yes, I'll put everything on the line. First, I'll return the inheritance of the Ushiromiya family. Accept it!!"
PC Japanese (JP): …さぁ、好きなだけ食らうがいいッ…！！　私はそのルーレットに打ち勝つだろう。さぁ、全てを賭すぞ。まずは右代宮家の家督を返そう。受け取るがいいッ！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…さぁ、好きなだけ食らうがいいッ…！！　私はそのルーレットに打ち勝つだろう。さぁ、全てを賭すぞ。まずは右代宮家の家督を返そう。受け取るがいいッ！！」
Russian (RU): "...Приди и поглоти сколько пожелаешь!.. Я преодолею рулетку. Да, я поставлю на кон всё. Для начала я верну тебе наследство семьи Уширомия. Прими его!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Venha, devore o quanto você desejar...!! Eu irei superar esta roleta. Sim, eu colocarei tudo em ordem. Primeiro, eu irei devolver a liderança da família Ushiromiya. Aceite isto!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…來吧，盡情享用吧…！！反正我會在輪盤賭中取勝。來吧，我賭上一切。先把右代宮家的家督之位還給你。拿去吧！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…来吧，尽情享用吧…！！反正我会在轮盘赌中取胜。来吧，我赌上一切。先把右代宫家的家督之位还给你。拿去吧！！」
Indonesian (IDN): "...Datanglah, lahaplah sepuas hatimu...!! Aku akan meraih kemenangan atas roulette itu. Ya, aku akan mempertaruhkan segalanya. Pertama-tama, aku akan mengembalikan warisan keluarga Ushiromiya. Terimalah!!"
Italian (IT): "Forza, mangia quanto vuoi...!! Riuscirò a vincere in questa roulette. Sì, punterò tutto. Per prima cosa, restituirò l'eredità della famiglia Ushiromiya. Accettala!!"
Turkish (TR): "...Gel, dilediğin kadar tüket...!! Bu ruletin üstesinden geleceğim. Evet...her şeyimi ortaya koyuyorum. İlk olarak, Ushiromiya ailesinin reisliğini geri vereceğim. Al!!"

Umineko Project (UP): As Kinzo violently opened the window, he ripped the golden ring from his finger, and forcefully threw it away.
Steam (ST): Kinzo tore the window open, ripped a golden ring off his finger, and forcefully threw it away.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As Kinzo violently opened the window, he ripped off a golden ring stuck to his finger and forcefully threw it away.
PC Japanese (JP): 金蔵は乱暴に窓を開けると、指にはめていた黄金の指輪をむしり取り、力強く投げ捨てる。
Russian (RU): Как только Кинзо яростно распахнул окно, он сорвал с пальца золотое кольцо и изо всех сил швырнул его.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ao abrir violentamente a janela, Kinzo arrancou o anel de ouro de seu dedo e o jogou longe.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 金藏粗暴地打開窗戶，把戴在手上的黃金戒指拔下來，用力扔了出去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 金藏粗暴地打开窗户，把戴在手上的黄金戒指拔下来，用力扔了出去。
Indonesian (IDN): Kinzo membuka jendela dengan kasar, mencabut cincin emas dari jarinya, dan melemparkannya dengan keras.
Italian (IT): Kinzo aprì violentemente la finestra, sfilò con foga un anello d'oro dal suo dito e lo gettò via con forza...
Turkish (TR): Kinzo pencereyi şiddetle açarken, altın yüzüğü parmağından çıkardı ve büyük bir güçle fırlattı.

Umineko Project (UP): ......At that moment, thunder resounded, giving the illusion that the lightning had accepted the ring.
Steam (ST): ......At that time, the sound of thunder rang out, giving the illusion that the lightning had accepted the ring.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......At that time, thunder resounded, giving the illusion that the lightning had accepted the ring.
PC Japanese (JP): ……その時、雷鳴が響き、まるで稲光がそれを受け取ったかのような錯覚がした。
Russian (RU): ......В тот же момент раздался гром, создав впечатление, будто молния приняла кольцо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......No mesmo momento, um trovão ressoou, dando a impressão de que o relâmpago aceitou o anel.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……正在此時，雷鳴聲響徹天外，簡直給人一種閃電接過了戒指的錯覺。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……正在此时，雷鸣声响彻天外，简直给人一种闪电接过了戒指的错觉。
Indonesian (IDN): ......Pada saat itu, suara petir menggema, menciptakan ilusi bahwa kilat menyambut cincin tersebut.
Italian (IT): In quel momento risuonò un rombo di tuono, dando l'illusione che il lampo avesse acconsentito.
Turkish (TR): ......O anda bir gök gürültüsü duyuldu ve yıldırımın yüzüğü kabul ettiği izlenimini yarattı.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Umineko Project (UP): "And.........when you are resurrected, it will be me who stands there. I will live until the end and watch over you as you awaken."
Steam (ST): "And, ......when you are resurrected, surely I will be the one who stands witness. I will survive until the end and watch over you as you awaken.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "And with that........., when you are resurrected, I will be there. I will live until the end and watch over you as you awaken.
PC Japanese (JP): 「そして………、お前が蘇った時、そこにいるのは私であるだろう。私が最後まで生き残り、お前の目覚めを見守るだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そして………、お前が蘇った時、そこにいるのは私であるだろう。私が最後まで生き残り、お前の目覚めを見守るだろう」
Russian (RU): "И......... когда ты возродишься, я буду здесь. Я буду жить до последнего и наблюдать, как ты пробуждаешься."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "E.........quando você ressuscitar, vou ser eu quem estará aqui de pé. Eu viverei até o fim e observarei você despertar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「然後………，當你復甦之時，在你身邊的會是我吧。我會活到最後，會親眼看到你甦醒吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「然后………，当你复苏之时，在你身边的会是我吧。我会活到最后，会亲眼看到你苏醒吧。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Dan, ......saat kau bangkit kembali, pastilah aku yang menjadi saksi kebangkitanmu. Aku akan bertahan hingga akhir dan mengawasi saat kau terbangun.
Italian (IT): "E poi... quando sarai resuscitata, io in quel momento sarò lì. Sopravvivrò fino alla fine, e osserverò il tuo risveglio..."
Turkish (TR): "Ve.........yeniden dirildiğinde, kalan ben olacağım. Sonuna kadar yaşayacağım ve sen uyanırken seni izleyeceğim."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
